input.sentences: annual sambhavi day gave us an opportunity to help so many children in need .
the children of our church performed the traditional prayer for guests .
we are all very proud that we could support the parents of the special needs children .
the money raised will help buy equipment that will make lives better .
all of our hard work was rewarded by the children 's smiling faces !
output.sentences: Margo loved having her family visit her at school, and insisted that they commemorate the occasion by taking photographs together.
The whole class was participating in Opportunity Day, so many parents and siblings had come to see the students celebrate.
So many families were so proud of their students, who had overcome so much to achieve their goals and work hard at their education.
Some of the students had even helped to raise money for other kids that were not as fortunate as themselves, and gave presentations on their efforts.
Margo was very proud of herself, and her peers, for all of their hard work.
